title: A low-cost assay for hydrogen peroxide using sewage sludge-based carbon nanodots
content:
Environ. Sci.: Water Res. Technol., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EW00197D, Paper
Xiaonan Liu, Long Wang, Yuling Ye, Zhicheng Pan, Aijie Wang, Wei Huang
In this work, sewage sludge-based carbon nanodots (ss-CNDs) were prepared by one-pot hydrothermal strategy using sewage sludge as the only raw material. The ss-CNDs showed high peroxidase-like activity. In the...
